data.title: MUST KUNLE AFOLAYAN ALSO BATHE IN THE SAND?
data.meta_description: Oba Akiolu of Lagos has certainly smudged his nose on hard earth but must the otherwise respected filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan also bathe in dirty sand? Afolayan is said to have tweeted that Ibos are behind piracy in Nigeria after the Oba's infamous statement about all Ibos dying in the Lagoon in 7days
data.text:
Oba Akiolu of Lagos has certainly smudged his nose on hard earth but must the otherwise respected filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan also bathe in dirty sand?

Afolayan is said to have tweeted that Ibos are behind piracy in Nigeria after the Oba's infamous statement about all Ibos dying in the Lagoon in 7days had made the rounds.

Its sad what politics does to people, it is even sadder when we do not know when to be quiet. Sometimes if you have nothing better to say, just shut that trap!

Supporting or seeming to support anything close to genocide is dumb.

Gladly though, Afolayan who is in the business of making movies and in most need of a buying audience is said to have apologised and pulled down his infamous tweet.

Guess next time he would know when to apply the verbal zip and leave the ring for professional and career politicians to do the boxing. Dining and wining with them in government house doesn't really make you a 5-Star nincompoop like most of them.
